definition: Cantonese/short name for Guangdong 廣東|广东[Guang3 dong1]
Cantonese romanization/Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems

sentences.english: English is the official language, but Cantonese and Malay are also spoken.
sentences.chinese: 官方語言爲英語，粵語和馬來語同樣通行。

sentences.english: This article discusses the weak condition of the ba-sentences in Cantonese .
sentences.chinese: 文章主要討論粵語中的“把”字句的弱位狀態。

sentences.english: Tang poetry, for example, rhymes and sounds much better when read in Cantonese than in Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 比如唐詩用粵語讀起來押韻和發音都比普通話好。

sentences.english: Fluency in Mandarin or Cantonese , well spoken English. Additional Asian language is advantage.
sentences.chinese: 能講流利普通話或粵語及英語，懂其他亞洲語言尤佳。

sentences.english: Fewer than half of the 12 million people in the city speak Cantonese.
sentences.chinese: 在這座城市，不到六百萬的人講粵語。

sentences.english: His working languages are Mandarin , Teochew, Cantonese and French.
sentences.chinese: 他能夠使用流利的普通話，台州話，粵語和法語。

sentences.english: Aaron Kwok, one of the Four Heavenly Kings of Cantopop.
sentences.chinese: 郭富城，其中的四天王的粵語。

sentences.english: For these reasons, Cantonese is considered by some as richer and more specific.
sentences.chinese: 由於這些原因，粵語被認爲更豐富和更專業。

sentences.english: The retreat will be conducted in Mandarin, with Cantonese translation in some general sessions.
sentences.chinese: 退修會以國語爲主，敬拜專題設粵語翻譯。

sentences.english: The local people in Guangzhou mainly speak Cantonese.
The others include Cantopop Heavenly Kings Andy Lau and Leon Lai。
sentences.chinese: 其中包括粵語流行天王劉德華和黎明。

sentences.english: Yellow Ying, the new Chinese television station Cantonese news host broadcasts concurrently reporter.
sentences.chinese: 黃穎，新唐人電視臺粵語新聞主播兼記者。

sentences.english: You'll have to learn Mandarin or Cantonese, and preferably both.
sentences.chinese: 你必須要會普通話或是粵語，最好兩者都會。

sentences.english: Who had abandoned Cantonese pop songs?
sentences.chinese: 誰使粵語流行曲成爲棄兒？

sentences.english: I also think that Popup Chinese should start a Cantonese version.
sentences.chinese: 我也覺得泡泡中文應該開粵語版。

sentences.english: This part infers the Baise speech according to preceding text analysis to be supposed to be south the cassiabarktree the Cantonese Nanning yongxun piece.
sentences.chinese: 這部分根據上文分析推斷百色話應屬桂南粵語邕潯片。

definition: Mandarin (common language)/Putonghua (common speech of the Chinese language)/ordinary speech

Chinese language (Mandarin), emphasizing its national nature/Chinese as a primary or secondary school subject/Chinese in the context of the Nationalist Government/Guoyu, book of historical narrative c. 10th-5th century BC
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
unable to make sense of what one is hearing
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
